homepage.purpose: SESA connects University of Ottawa students with industry professionals in software engineering, providing resources, networking, and career development to ensure they can be successful.
homepage.events_subheading: Register today and save the date. Add our events to your calendar using the built-in embed feature!

contact_us.questions_blurb: Questions about our organization? Interest in collaborating with us? Send a message to our email, or complete the inquiry form, and we'll respond as soon as possible.
contact_us.form_email_label: How can we reach you? (So we can reply to you)
contact_us.form_body_placeholder: Include as much detail as you can.
contact_us.form_disclosure: By submitting this form, I confirm that I have read and accept the

events.stay_updated_blurb: Stay in the loop with SESA’s updates, events, and announcements by following our social media channels!
events.stay_up_to_date_blurb: Add our calendar to yours to stay informed about all our activities, or select specific events you’d like to add.
events.btn_subscribe: Subscribe to our calendar for free
events.subscribe_info_line1: Syncs with Apple, Outlook, Yahoo, or Google.
events.teamup_heading: Interested in teaming up on an event?
events.teamup_blurb: Whether you’re an organization or student club, we’re open to exploring partnerships that deliver meaningful opportunities and experiences to students pursuing software engineering at the University of Ottawa.

resources.resources_blurb: Our academic team actively curates free resources to support software engineering students in their studies.
resources.search_placeholder: Search by title, category, course, or author
resources.contributing_heading: Interested in contributing or requesting resources?
resources.education_quote_2: SESA's academic team is proud to stand at that intersection

footer.blurb: We connect SEG & EECS students with software engineering industry professionals, providing resources and support.
